title: Hottie Who Likes it Natural
text:
Email 2 
After creating ripples in Tollywood and Kollywood, actress Shriya Saran made her presence felt in Bollywood too in her last release “Drishyam”, starring Ajay Devgn. The stylish diva reveals that she swears by kitchen ingredients to look a million bucks. 
Dressed to kill 
Favourite formal outfit I love wearing sarees, I am not a fan of gowns though I like Indo-Western outfits. I wish I could wear shorts and give away the awards! 
Love wearing 
Shorts or denims which I like to pair with a white top with it. 
Favourite designers 
Rajat Tangri, Gaurav Gupta, Manish Malhotra, Sabyasachi, Channel and Elie Saab are my all time favourite. 
Best dressed actress in the industry 
I feel Priyanka Chopra is best dressed in Bollywood. Would like your man to be dressed in I would like him dressed in white shirt and blue denims. 
Look best in 
I feel I look good in casuals and Indian wear. 
Favourite brand in jeans 
I don’t wear jeans a lot. I find it very annoying because Indian weather is not denim friendly. Like every Indian, I started wearing Levis then I moved to Diesel and True Religion. 
Favourite brand in sunglasses I love Chanel. I buy a lot of sunglasses but I am partial to my old Chanel sunglasses. 
Best fragrance 
Chanel No 5 and Coco Chanel are my favourite. I also love Elie Saab, it smells great. Poison is my all-time favourite, as I have grown up wearing it. I also love Nasa. 
Favourite brand in watches 
I hardly wear them but I love the Rolex I had bought. Once I was sitting with Rajinikanth sir, and he asked me the difference between a Rolex and any other watch. He and asked, “Does the time get better when you are wearing a Rolex?” 
Favourite colours 
I like all earthy clolours . I love whites too. I have learnt to wear black, but honestly I feel very lost when I am wearing black. 
Makeup 
Favourite brands in makeup Chanel and I am a big fan of Bobby Brown. Feature you like to highlight I like to highlight My eyes. I feel they are the window to one’s soul and they should be shown in the best possible way. 
Your makeup when you not shooting Just lip balm or kajal as I feel the skin needs to breathe. I avoid foundation as I try not to wear makeup. 
Care for mane Hair-care routine 
It’s horrible! I take my vitamins when possible; but I am very lazy about them. I oil my hair with coconut oil mixed with burnt curry leaves, it’s very good. 
Your favourite shampoo and conditioner 
None really, but I feel I am going to be a big fan of Poise Essential. I also like Moroccan oil. But the best way to wash your hair is with Shikakai.
